page.title: 11LEISURE TIME
page.content: People living in the area use their leisure time in many different ways. Some enjoy water sports including swimming,sailing,water skiing,wind surfing and scuba diving. Fishing in the area is good with brown trout,sea trout and salmon being caught in the nearby river Lune and its tributaries. There are two fish farms _ at Raisbeck and Tebay. Fell-walking is a popular passtime for some folk with the Lake District, the Pennines and the Howgill Fells all within easy reach of the area. In the winter months Orton Badminton Club caters for the more energetic folk,while a number of teenagers go to a Young Farmers Club.Car rallying is a popular passtime and fox hunting (on foot)has a good following in the area. Almost all households have a TV set. The George Hotel is well patronised.
